articles.author: Andrea Adelson
articles.title: ND's Hidalgo rips refs for forcing her to miss time to get nose ring out - ESPN
articles.description: Freshman All-American Hannah Hidalgo was forced to take her nose ring out in the middle of Notre Dame's 70-65 loss to Oregon State on Friday in the Sweet 16, as game officials enforced an NCAA rule prohibiting jewelry during games.
articles.content: ALBANY, N.Y. -- Freshman All-American Hannah Hidalgo was forced to take her nose ring out in the middle of Notre Dame's70-65 loss to Oregon State on Friday in the Sweet 16, as game officials enforced… [+3338 chars]

articles.author: Sandra Lilley
articles.title: A record surge in dengue cases in Latin America spurs a warning - NBC News
articles.description: A record surge in dengue cases throughout Latin America and the Caribbean this year prompted the head of the Pan American Health Organization to call for collective action to curb the deadly mosquito-borne viral disease.
